sense.def:
To quell opposition or violent behaviour
pomeni prekiniti nasprotovanje ali nasilno vedênje s prepričevanjem ali uporabo sile.

seg.quote: The police had been called in to quell a minor disturbance.

sense.def:
To quell feelings
pomeni prisiliti se, da določenih občutkov, na primer strahu ali žalosti, ne čutimo več.

seg.quote: I was trying to quell a growing unease.
